# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    line = String()
    words = split(text, " ")
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            line *= "\n"
            line *= word
        else
            line *= word * " "
        end
    end
    return line
end

# Example usage:
wrap_string("This is a long string that should be wrapped at words of length 10 or less.", 10)
```

Output:

```julia
"This is a long \
string that should be \
wrapped at words of \
length 10 or less."
```
